message.body: Hey there - your mom might have mentioned this already - we're planning on doing the Zemel family Thanksgiving in Shunk this year. I hope you can make it - please let us know when u get a handle on your schedule . Shana Tova and hope you're well
Great! I only have school monday and tuesday that week. Is simone welcome?
Sure - it will be a barn party for the cousins, old folks in the house
